title: HUDSON Men's Luca Loose Fit Wide Leg Denim Pant
description: Our Luca Wide Leg Jean in Bleached is a loose silhouette with a mid-rise waist and wide cut through the leg
The light indigo vintage wash has a natural worn-in look with heavy stone washing, acid washing, bleaching, whiskering and bleach splatter
This pair is made of rigid denim with classic five-pocket detailing, grinding along the edges, dull nickel hardware and signature embroidery on the waistband
With a 90's grunge look and feel, our Luca Wide Leg Jean is a loose silhouette with a mid-rise waist and wide cut through the leg.
